llmSegmentedChunks.chunkText: Booking Process How do I book an appointment? Simply say "book an appointment" or "hello" to start. The bot will guide you through selecting a service, choosing a date and time, and confirming your details.

What information do I need to provide to book? ● If mobile service: your full address (street number, name, suburb, postcode) for travel cost calculation and service area validation. ● If new customer: just your first name.
How do I select a service? You’ll be shown a list with: ● Service Name ● Icon: ○ = mobile service ○ = in-store service ● Price (fixed or estimated) ● Duration Choose one by tapping the button.
